sentences.cn: 人们指责媒体侵犯了大家的隐私.
sentences.en: The media is accused of infringing on people's privacy.

sentences.cn: 媒体大量地报道这些事件只会使问题持续下去.
sentences.en: Giving these events a lot of media coverage merely perpetuates the problem.

sentences.cn: 这个工厂投产的新机器广获传媒报道.
sentences.en: The launch of their new machines in this factory received much media coverage.

sentences.cn: 当地媒体报道了全国范围的骚乱.
sentences.en: The local media reported rioting across the country.

sentences.cn: 研讨会旨在综览新兴的媒体出版.
sentences.en: The seminar aims to provide an overview on new media publishing.

sentences.cn: 媒体由国家控制,是执政党的喉舌.
sentences.en: The media is controlled by the state and acts as a mouthpiece for the ruling party.

sentences.cn: 媒体倾向于把这几类人归在一起.
sentences.en: The media tends to lump all these groups together.

sentences.cn: 多年来无线电广播在传媒界中一直不受重视。
sentences.en: For years radio has been the Cinderella of the media world.

sentences.cn: 她把这项工作当作她从事媒体职业的起点。
sentences.en: She regards the job as a launch pad for her career in the media.

sentences.cn: 大众传播学讲师职位
sentences.en: a lectureship in media studies

sentences.cn: 现在新闻媒体无处不在。
sentences.en: These days the media are omnipresent.

sentences.cn: 他说媒体就如同饿狼一般。
sentences.en: He says the media are ravening wolves.

sentences.cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。
sentences.en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.

sentences.cn: 那些言论似乎从来没有被西方媒体报道过。
sentences.en: Those statements have never been reported in the Western media.

sentences.cn: 现在他准备通过开展地区性的媒体活动加大宣传力度。
sentences.en: Now he plans to rev up publicity with a regional media campaign.

sentences.cn: 他觉得媒体应该对报道的内容更负责任些。
sentences.en: He feels that the media should be more responsible in what they report.

sentences.cn: 新政治和现代媒体之间的相互作用将会扰乱政治进程，妨碍其正常运作。
sentences.en: The interplay between the new politics and the modern media will unbalance the political process and inhibit its workings.

sentences.cn: 另一方面，布莱尔高里高地赛确实是真正的比赛，而不单是媒体盛事。
sentences.en: The Blairgowrie Highland Games, on the other hand, are the real thing rather than a media event.

sentences.cn: 珍妮·杰克逊的新专辑已经在媒体上进行了大规模宣传。
sentences.en: Janet Jackson's new album has been heralded by a massive media campaign.

sentences.cn: 12月8日，一场大规模媒体宣传活动轰轰烈烈地展开了。
sentences.en: On December 8 the media blitz began in earnest.

sentences.cn: 媒体为什么对这座光彩夺目的城市持如此悲观的看法？
sentences.en: Why does the media present such a negative view of this splendid city?

sentences.cn: 她是目前最富有、最受媒体追捧的人物之一。
sentences.en: She is one of the wealthiest, most ubiquitous media personalities around.

sentences.cn: 我已经确信印刷媒体比电视更准确、更可靠。
sentences.en: I have been convinced that the print media are more accurate and more reliable than television.

sentences.cn: 该计划的主要反对声音来自媒体。
sentences.en: Much of the opposition to this plan has come from the media.

sentences.cn: 媒体对这次审判进行了全面报道。
sentences.en: The trial was fully reported in the media.

sentences.cn: 人们指责媒体左右了终审判决。
sentences.en: The media was/were accused of influencing the final decision.

sentences.cn: 这位演员参加任何一项活动，都引起媒体的广泛关注。
sentences.en: Any event attended by the actor received widespread media coverage .

sentences.cn: 这是份苦差，并非像媒体描绘的那般令人向往。
sentences.en: It is hard work and not a glamorous job as portrayed by the media.

sentences.cn: 新闻媒体的偏见
sentences.en: ...bias in the news media...

sentences.cn: 如今消费者做出购买决策的方式表明，市场营销的影响力来自于传统付费媒体之外的诸多因素。
sentences.en: The way consumers now approach the process of making purchase decisions means that marketing’s impact stem from a broad range of factors beyond conventional paid media.

sentences.cn: 推销产品的市场营销人员掌控着付费和自有媒体。
sentences.en: Paid and owned media are controlled by marketers promoting their own products.

sentences.cn: 而对于无偿媒体来说，营销人员就像是触发用户响应的催化剂。
sentences.en: For earned media , such marketers act as the initiator for users' responses.

sentences.cn: 这种遭劫持的媒体和无偿媒体相反:一项资产或者一个活动被消费者、利益相关者或激进分子劫持为人质，对某一品牌或产品发表负面评论。
sentences.en: Such hijacked media are the opposite of earned media: an asset or campaign becomes hostage to consumers, other stakeholders, or activists who make negative allegations about a brand or product.

sentences.cn: 例如，社交网络的用户开始意识到，他们可以通过“劫持”媒体，对最初创建媒体的企业进行施压。
sentences.en: Members of social networks, for instance, are learning that they can hijack media to apply pressure on the businesses that originally created them.

sentences.cn: 即便如此,这些富裕的家族只与国际上1%的人交往，而媒体的干涉使他们越来越难以维持正面形象。
sentences.en: Even so, these are wealthy families who party with the international 1%, and media intrusiveness makes it increasingly difficult to maintain the right image.

sentences.cn: 为了把观点阐释清楚,她继续说:“越来越明显的是,目的的缺失以及政府、媒体或企业中道德语言的缺失可能会成为资本主义与自由最危险的目标之一。”
sentences.en: Driving her point home, she continued: “It’s increasingly apparent that the absence of purpose, of a moral language within government, media or business could become one of the most dangerous goals for capitalism and freedom.”

sentences.cn: 然而，随着对所有媒体的越来越不信任，人们可能开始提高他们的媒体素养能力。
sentences.en: Yet as distrust has risen toward all media, people may be starting to beef up their media literacy skills.

sentences.cn: 另外,一项专门为 BuzzFeed新闻版块开展的调查发现，44%的脸书用户很少或从不相信来自这个媒体巨头的新闻报道。
sentences.en: And a survey conducted for Buzz Feed News found 44 percent of Facebook users rarely or never trust news from the media giant.

sentences.cn: 约三分之一的美国人认为虚假新闻的问题在于人们通过社交媒体“对事实新闻进行扭曲或夸大”。
sentences.en: About a third say the problem of fake news lies in “misinterpretation or exaggeration of actual news" via social media.

sentences.cn: 超重的人有时在媒体拍摄中出现时脸部都是被遮住的。
sentences.en: The overweight are sometimes pictured in the media with their faces covered.

sentences.cn: 在当下一些骇人事件影响了大众媒体对青少年报道角度的背景下，这样的调查结果看起来可能出人意料。
sentences.en: Such results may seem surprising against the background of shocking incidents that color the way the mass media portray the young.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 人们现在正承受着小型电子产品过多所带来的痛苦吗？他们是否会为设备和线上媒体的不断更新所造成的消费概念上的大脑疲劳（即信息超载）而感到精疲力竭呢？。
sentences.en: Are people suffering from gadget overload? Are they exhausted by the consumer equivalent of the brain fatigue—information overload—that is caused by constant updates of devices and online media?.

sentences.cn: 尽管大公司很容易成立起自己的广告部，写些自己的广告，买媒体时段，但他们倾向于使用大广告公司的服务。
sentences.en: Although large companies could easily set up their own advertising departments, write their own advertisements and buy media space themselves, they tend to use the services of large advertising agencies

sentences.en: The agency creates advertisements and develops a media plan, specifying which media will be used and in which proportions

sentences.cn: 我还研究了媒体是如何描绘年长者的。这也当下的关注重点，因为年长者的人数在英国社会所占的比例越来越大，实际上在全世界也是如此。
sentences.en: I’ve also looked at how older people are represented in the media; again, it’s of major current interest with older people becoming a much larger proportion of UK and indeed world society

Sentence.sentence: The family turned to social media expressing their gratitude saying, "From the bottom of our hearts, we would like to deeply thank each and every person that stopped by!"
